LOG.casyADatumy: Times and dates of possible arrivals
LOG.logInfo:
This log represents a contract and a delivery note. If agreed upon, the contractual parties may require additional documentation, such as CMR, invoice, or other.
  The contract is commercial in nature. As such, it is a subject to applicable laws and may be affected by legal and/or contractual duties not stated in this log.
  Terms and conditions, as well as transport rules and orders, may apply. This log has been generated automatically and is based on data aquired by the application operator.
  Both contractual parties can access this log via their app. For more info visit www.mantra-online.eu.
LOG.zrusenie1: suggested to abort the agreed transport job
LOG.zrusenie3: agreed to abort - transport job has been aborted
LOG.odmiernutie1: did not agree to abort - transport job continues
